data.DescriptionHtml:
An invisible cone of terror causes each living creature in the area to become panicked unless it succeeds on a Will save. If cornered, a panicked creature begins cowering. (See the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information on fear-panicked creatures). If the Will save succeeds, the creature is shaken for 1 round.

Material Component: Either the heart of a hen or a white feather.
data.Name: Fear
